title: Webroot AntiVirus 5.5 with AntiSpyware and Firewall 2 Year (US).
description:
Webroot AntiVirus with AntiSpyware & Firewall offers 360 degrees of powerful, multi-layer protection against viruses, spyware, data theft and hackers and is now compatible with Windows Vista.

What&#039;s New in Version 5.5


New name, better protection
Spy Sweeper with AntiVirus is now Webroot AntiVirus with AntiSpyware & Firewall. The software still includes both the award-winning SophosÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® AntiVirus and the top-rated WebrootÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Spy Sweeper technologies, and now includes powerful Desktop Firewall protection.

Protection against hackers and data theft
Webroot Desktop Firewall provides proactive, multi-layer protection against unauthorized attempts to access your computer and personal data. This powerful two-way protection "learns" what should and should not be allowed based on your normal activity ÃƒÂ¢?? which means less effort for you to maximize your protection. Any unusual attempts to access your computer or run programs without your knowledge are blocked immediately. Users can also customize their security with rules to restrict or allow any program.

Windows Vista compatible
Webroot AntiVirus with AntiSpyware & Firewall is fully compatible with Windows VistaÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢. It provides superior protection above and beyond the basic security features found in Windows, and will not cause conflicts with those features. In addition, WebrootÃƒÂ¢??s firewall technology is fully integrated with the Windows Security Center for added convenience.

Visit Features and Benefits for additional product highlights
We performed extensive user interaction testing and refined the Webroot AntiVirus with AntiSpyware & Firewall interface to make it even easier for users of all technical abilities to stay protected. Advanced users continue to have the power to configure the program to suit their unique needs, while new users can breeze through the straightforward setup. The new interface sets the standard in ease-of-use and efficiency for spyware removal programs.



Additional Webroot Benefits


FREE Customer Support
All Webroot products are designed to be very easy to set up and use. But if you do need assistance, our friendly U.S.-based support representatives are experts in helping to get you back up and running quickly. Unlike many of our competitors, we offer this online and phone support absolutely FREE.

Satisfaction Guarantee
Webroot proudly stands behind our products, which is why all Webroot products are backed by a 30-day money-back guarantee - no questions asked.
